definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Cautery burners need to be sterilized.
Cauterize damage taken increased from 10 to 15.
sentences.chinese: 燒灼傷口技能所造成的傷害從10增加到15。

sentences.english: Burning and frequency are common associated symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 燒灼感及尿頻爲常見伴隨症狀。

sentences.english: A couple of years ago I had burning when I passed water.
sentences.chinese: 幾年以前我排尿時有過燒灼感。

sentences.english: Under anaesthesia, the fallopian tubes may be cauterized or clamped in order to prevent sperm from entering the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 通常通過燒灼和鉗合輸卵管來防止精子進入子宮。

sentences.english: He burned his hands at the glass-works.
He has had burning or pain when he urinates .
sentences.chinese: 他小便時感到燒灼和疼痛。

sentences.english: There has been no burning in epigastrium.
Cauterization of episcleral vein was used to set up rat's EIOP model.
sentences.chinese: 應用燒灼鞏膜靜脈的方法制作大鼠慢性EIOP模型。

sentences.english: Burn mark - surface clouding or irregularity caused by excessive heat generated during polishing.
sentences.chinese: 燒痕是因劣質快速拋光導致刻面燒灼痕。

sentences.english: MethodsThe model rats with gastric ulcer were prepared by glacial acetic acid.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用冰醋酸燒灼法制備大鼠胃潰瘍模型。

sentences.english: During execution of this maneuver, the anterior ethmoidal artery is torn and must be cauterized with forceps.
sentences.chinese: 手術過程中，篩前動脈破裂，需要用止血鉗燒灼止血。

sentences.english: Laser beams may cauterize and heal ulcers .
sentences.chinese: 激光束可以燒灼和癒合潰瘍。

sentences.english: Burning sensations or flush were rarely reported, they note.
sentences.chinese: 僅有少量的燒灼感或者潮紅。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of acute ocular hypertension of rabbits induced by cauterizing vortex veins.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討渦靜脈燒灼法誘發兔急性高眼壓的效果。

sentences.english: It also can be easily fired singe-handedly, like most pistols.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以很容易地發射燒灼一手，最喜歡的手槍。

definition: body palpation (diagnostic method in TCM)/tactile examination
